quote_txt: On gay marriage

quote_txt: Says Georgia Power customers pay 10 percent to 15 percent below the national average for electricity.

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2013 in an op-ed article:
quote_txt: "There is no statistical evidence that bail bonds increase the likelihood of those awaiting trial returning to court for their scheduled hearings."

There’s issues that actually that really do matter, social issues that matter to the people of this state. So I know Barbara would support those issues, I know the governor hasn’t. You’ve seen the actions he’s taken on them."
